thread.title: James Shelton
thread.title_full: KT Performance reviewed by James Shelton

author: James Shelton
title: James Shelton
text: Great service. Quick shipment even got one part out a day before they said they could due to back order. Only problem I saw and may have missed it myself was wishing they had said isspro guages came directly from manufacturers. But like I said I may have over looked that.
